title: G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) - Physical Science Stream
description: Achieve excellent results in the Physical Science (Maths) stream for your A/Ls. High marks in Combined Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry are essential for gaining admission to a state university's engineering faculty.

title: BSc Engineering Degree (Civil)
description: Enroll in a 4-year Bachelor of the Science of Engineering (BScEng) degree specializing in Civil Engineering. This degree is accredited by the Institution of Engineers, Sri Lanka (IESL).
institutes: General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University (KDU)

title: Graduate Engineer & IESL Associate Membership
description: After graduation, secure a position as a Graduate Engineer or Site Engineer at a construction or consultancy firm. Register as an Associate Member of the Institution of Engineers, Sri Lanka (IESL) to begin your path to chartership.

title: Achieve Chartered Engineer Status
description: Gain a minimum of four years of relevant post-graduate experience under the supervision of a Chartered Engineer. Fulfill the IESL's training requirements and pass the professional review to become a Chartered Engineer.
institutes: N/A - Based on experience and chartership

title: Senior Project Manager / Consultant
description: With significant experience and chartership, you can advance to senior roles like Project Manager, Resident Engineer, or open your own consultancy firm. A Master's degree (MSc) can further enhance career prospects.
qualifications: MSc in a specialized field (e.g., Structural, Geotechnical)
institutes: All major construction and consultancy firms
